tips.title: Optimal Listening
tips.content: Use headphones for the best experience and keep volume at a comfortable level.

tips.title: Session Duration
tips.content: Start with shorter sessions (2-3 minutes) and gradually increase as comfortable.

tips.title: Environment
tips.content: Find a quiet, comfortable space where you won't be disturbed.

tips.title: Regularity
tips.content: Practice regularly for best results, ideally at the same time each day.
